data.title: Treegrid Acid Test
data.text:
Treegrid

The following example demonstrates the treegrid design pattern.

Example

In this example, a treegrid is used to make an interactive tree that enables users to both navigate the hierarchical structure of email conversations and also navigate elements that describe each email, such as subject and sender.

Example Usage Options

This example demonstrates three different ways of implementing the keyboard navigation specified in the treegrid pattern. The following links change the behavior of the navigation keys:
